**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 1.1 **Price** 13,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _hell staff_ is a tall, pointed staff forged of red-tinted steel with [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19) inscriptions that march neatly down its sides. At its top sits an inverted ruby pyramid divided into nine sections. Found mostly in Cheliax or other lands where [diabolic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30) influences hold sway, when used as a weapon the staff is a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [axiomatic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=291) [unholy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=307) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. When you prepare this staff, if you're chaotic or good, you become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) until your next daily preparations. The staff's [_summon lesser servitor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1010) spell can be used only to summon animals with the [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) trait, devils, or [hell hounds](/Monsters.aspx?ID=259) (at 4th level). Its [_summon fiend_](/Spells.aspx?ID=323) spell can summon only devils or hell hounds.
  • **Cantrip** [_divine lance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=84) (evil or lawful only)
  • **1st** [_protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=238), _summon lesser servitor_
  • **2nd** _summon lesser servitor_, [_undetectable alignment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=348)
  • **3rd** [_chilling darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), _summon lesser servitor_
  • **4th** [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86) (evil or lawful only), _summon lesser servitor_
  • **5th** [_flame strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), _summon fiend_
  • **6th** [_devil form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=894), _summon fiend_
  • **7th** [_divine decree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=82) (evil or lawful only), _summon fiend_
**Craft Requirements** You're lawful evil. Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Hell Staff
